sentences.sentence: You know how you survive? You make people need you.
sentences.translation: 怎样才能生存？你要让别人需要你。

sentences.sentence: It never will rain roses. When we want to have more roses we must plant trees.
sentences.translation: 天上永远不会掉下玫瑰来，如果想要更多的玫瑰，必须自己种植。

sentences.sentence: The most important kind of freedom is to be what you really are.
sentences.translation: 最重要的自由是成为真正的你。

sentences.sentence: I will bring honor to us all.
sentences.translation: 我将为所有人赢得荣耀。

sentences.sentence: Self-love is saying no to abuse and betrayal.
sentences.translation: 自爱会告诉你不要以恶待人。
